subject: Nice,
author: SnowfireL@aol.com
full_text:
--part1_2643f.149cc16.3ab22815_boundary
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Well, Tech David said something very nice this morning, "Father God has the 
 whole Earth in His Hands, and He's holding on to the Earth plane" reminded 
me of  that old time song, "He's got the whole world in His Hands" so, 
thought I'd  share this new, and very old information with everyone.  sf

--part1_2643f.149cc16.3ab22815_boundary
